alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 27 at 9:58PM CST until December 30 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie affecting Richland County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Wahpeton affecting Wilkin and Richland Counties. For the Red River...including Wahpeton, Hickson, Fargo, Halstad, East Grand Forks, Oslo, Drayton, Pembina...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Wild Rice River (ND)...including Abercrombie...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 15.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.0 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. late Thursday night at 400 AM CST.
